content.text:
I now this is a long shot, but can anyone help me find a website I forgot?

- I found it within the last year.
- It was a brochure-ish page for a co-op or hackerspace, maybe in NZ?
- The style was sort of lo-fi, not much CSS, sort of like http://n55.dk/MANUALS/Manuals.html
- Blue/green/turquoise background?
- IIRC they advertised that people stayed at the hackerspace?
- I remember thinking "this is a really cool group"
- Called themselves a "hyperspace" instead of a hackerspace (or something similar)

Anyone know what I'm talking about?
